notes: The Bureau of Sanitation collects large metal and household appliances, such as refrigerators, washers, dryers, and dishwashers, from all residents serviced by the City of Los Angeles, free of charge. To make arrangements to have these items collected call at least one day before your regular collection day, or visit website for online service form.
